description:
Even if you're donning performance-fit boots, there's no need to compromise on comfort and support. Elevate your skiing or snowboarding experience with Superfeet Winter Thin Support insoles, meticulously crafted for winter enthusiasts. Trim these insoles to fit your boot size and enjoy the winter wonderland to the fullest.

  • A deep heel cup gives you a secure and stable fit within your boots, cradling your feet securely
  • Benefit from orthotic support that stabilizes your feet within ski and snowboard boots
  • Superfeet insoles maintain their shape, offering unwavering support and comfort throughout the entire season
  • Say goodbye to odors, as MoistureWick™ helps keep your boots fresh
  • Stay warm even in chilly temperatures with a thermal top cover
  • The unique carbon fiber and polymer blend Evolyte® Carbon Fiber Stabilizer Cap maintains its shape under compression, providing stability with each turn
  • Experience full-foot contact with a Thin, High-Density Foam Layer for enhanced stability in your boots
name: Superfeet Winter Thin Support Insoles - Unisex
